title: Check the Status of a FOIA Request
description: A journalist who filed a FOIA request two weeks ago is calling to check on its status.

tasks.description: Identify the journalist and their request using the tracking number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The records officer successfully locates the pending request.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current status from the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer finds the status is 'In Review' with the legal department.

tasks.description: Provide a status update to the journalist.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer informs the journalist that the request is still under review.
